description.narrative: The proposed Project, in parallel with the other two projects on solar parks and rooftop solar (currently under preparation), will help the GoI achieve its new solar targets of 100 GW installed capacity, demonstrate important economies of scale in solar generation, increase efficiency while reducing transaction costs and unit costs of solar power, and minimize environmental pollution and GHG emissions.

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
